ConverterSection.description: Internxt offers the best way to compress multiple PDF files for free online. Secure and share PDFs without worrying about attachment limits.

howToConvert.title: How to compress a PDF file
howToConvert.description: To compress a PDF file, follow these steps:

steps.description: Upload your PDF file: drag and drop your file into the area above, or upload it from your device to start the conversion.

howToConvert.outro: With this tool, you can compress multiple PDF files for free whenever you need. All files are secured with encrypted uploads to guarantee the privacy of your videos.

whyConvert.title: Why you may need to compress large PDF files
whyConvert.intro: Sending large PDF files may cause challenges with email or file sharing limits, upload limits, or slower upload speeds. With this free tool, you can compress multiple PDF files for free and enjoy these benefits:
bullets: Optimize files for web or mobile viewing
whyConvert.outro: There are no limits to this tool, so you can compress large PDF files of up to XGB and handle multiple files without signing up or running into daily restrictions.
